text: The Medan Light Rail Transit (Medan LRT) is a planned light rail transit system in Medan, Indonesia that is expected to start being constructed in 2020. ==History== In 2018, companies from China and South Korea have expressed interest in developing the project. In June 2019, Korea Rail Network Authority was announced as the preferred partner, and that the LRT will connect Medan, Binjai, Deli Serdang and Karo. ==References== Category:Airport rail links in Indonesia Category:Rapid transit in Indonesia Category:Light rail
title: Medan Light Rail Transit
